trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows速 8 and Windows Server速 2012 include Windows PowerShell 3.0 and all of its prerequisites.
trans-unit.target: Windows速 8 and Windows Server速 2012 include Windows PowerShell 3.0 and all of its prerequisites.

trans-unit.source: The system also includes the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine for backward compatibility with host programs that cannot use Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: The system also includes the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine for backward compatibility with host programs that cannot use Windows PowerShell 3.0.

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on earlier systems and install and enable the required features.
trans-unit.target: This topic explains how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on earlier systems and install and enable the required features.

trans-unit.source: This topic includes the following sections:
trans-unit.target: This topic includes the following sections:

trans-unit.source: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnWindows8andWindowsServer2012)
trans-unit.target: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnWindows8andWindowsServer2012)

trans-unit.target: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnWindows7andWindowsServer2008R2)

trans-unit.target: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnWindowsServer2008LH)

trans-unit.source: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnServerCore)
trans-unit.target: [Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core](Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md#BKMK_InstallingOnServerCore)

trans-unit.source: [Deploying Windows PowerShell Web Access](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/639d0eff-98a3-4124-b52c-26921ebd98b0)
trans-unit.target: [Deploying Windows PowerShell Web Access](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/639d0eff-98a3-4124-b52c-26921ebd98b0)

trans-unit.source: [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md)
trans-unit.target: [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md)

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 arrives installed, configured, and ready to use.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 arrives installed, configured, and ready to use.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) is installed and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) is installed and enabled.

trans-unit.source: For information about starting Windows PowerShell, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) and [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831491.aspx#BKMK_powershell).
trans-unit.target: For information about starting Windows PowerShell, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows 8](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d7be1668-8617-4890-ad90-dd9765fbd2c3) and [Starting Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2012](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831491.aspx#BKMK_powershell).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 and Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 and Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: There are separate installation instructions below for computers running with the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2.
trans-unit.target: There are separate installation instructions below for computers running with the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Getting ready to install

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting Windows PowerShell 3.0, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows](Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about starting Windows PowerShell 3.0, see [Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows](Starting-Windows-PowerShell-on-Earlier-Versions-of-Windows.md).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell on Server Core

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running the Server Core installation option of Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: The first steps in the procedure use Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) commands to install Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 for Server Core and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: The first steps in the procedure use Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) commands to install Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 for Server Core and Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: These programs are prerequisites for Windows Management Framework 3.0, which is installed in a subsequent step.
trans-unit.target: These programs are prerequisites for Windows Management Framework 3.0, which is installed in a subsequent step.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Getting ready to install

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Start Cmd.exe
trans-unit.target: Start Cmd.exe

trans-unit.source: Run the following DISM commands.
trans-unit.target: Run the following DISM commands.

trans-unit.source: These commands install .NET Framework 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: These commands install .NET Framework 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 full installation for Server Core from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).
trans-unit.target: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 full installation for Server Core from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248450).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008
trans-unit.target: Installing Windows PowerShell on Windows Server 2008

trans-unit.source: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2.
trans-unit.target: These instructions explain how to install Windows PowerShell 3.0 on computers running Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2.

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2008 systems, Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) is a prerequisite for Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: On Windows Server 2008 systems, Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) is a prerequisite for Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: The "Extended Protection for Authentication" feature protects the computer from authentication forwarding attacks and allows you to use the **UseSSL** parameter when creating remote sessions.
trans-unit.target: The "Extended Protection for Authentication" feature protects the computer from authentication forwarding attacks and allows you to use the **UseSSL** parameter when creating remote sessions.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0 and the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine, use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0 and the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine, use the following procedure.

trans-unit.source: Getting ready to install
trans-unit.target: Getting ready to install

trans-unit.source: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Before installing Windows Management Framework 3.0, uninstall any previous versions of Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: To install Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 with Service Pack 1 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).
trans-unit.target: Install Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 with Service Pack 1 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242910).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).
trans-unit.target: Install Windows Management Framework (Windows PowerShell 2.0, KB 968930) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=243035).

trans-unit.source: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).
trans-unit.target: Install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212547).

trans-unit.source: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).
trans-unit.target: Or, install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919).

trans-unit.source: Install "Extended Protection for Authentication" (KB 968389) from [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).
trans-unit.target: Install "Extended Protection for Authentication" (KB 968389) from [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=186398).

trans-unit.source: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Install Windows Management Framework 3.0 from the Microsoft Download Center at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also
